item.title: Qualtrics Data Management
item.description: This is for output from Qualtrics that is downloaded in non-legacy format (for scoring on the Author Recognition Task). Before running Before running the Qualtrics survey, make sure to name all your stimuli and corresponding questions so that they are distinguishable from other questions (i.e.Â consent, age, gender, etc.). If I have an item with two follow up questions, I name them as such: S01_Q1: Where S01 is the item number (or T01), and Q1 is the first question

item.title: New Website
item.description: This website was created using Blogdown in R (and R Markdown). Details on how to create your own can be found here. The repository for my website, along with any R code, can be found on my Github.
